core_principles: No Generic SaaS Gradients (Avoid Purple/Teal smooth gradients)

typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Use Oxanium for all headings to give that 'gaming/tech' feel. Use Outfit for readability.

colors.rules: Background must be #050505 (Void Black). Use Cyan (#00F0FF) for all primary actions and glows. Avoid generic purple.

buttons.default: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-3 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.5)] transition-all clip-path-polygon-[0_0,100%_0,100%_70%,85%_100%,0_100%]
buttons.outline: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-3 transition-all

cards.classes: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.classes: bg-secondary/50 border-b-2 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:outline-none px-4 py-3 rounded-none transition-colors placeholder:text-white/20

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (See specific modes in persona)
layout.spacing: Relaxed. Use gap-8 or gap-12 for section separation.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise overlay on the background if possible (opacity 0.03).

media.icons: Lucide React (Shield, Zap, Server, Globe, Cpu, MemoryStick, Users, MessageSquare, ChevronRight, Menu, X)

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL FONTS: Add @import for Oxanium (400-800) and Outfit (300-700) in index.css immediately.
TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided above. Ensure 'primary' is #00F0FF.
HERO SECTION: Use the 'hero_bg' as a subtle background with a heavy dark overlay (90% opacity). The focus should be on typography and a 3D-style CSS element or glowing grid.
PRICING CARDS: These are the most important. Make them 'Holo-cards'. Glass background, 1px white/10 border. On hover: border becomes Cyan, shadow glows.
CALCULATOR: Build a functional React component with sliders for RAM and Slots. Display price in INR (₹). Logic: ₹150/GB approx.
ICONS: Use Lucide-react. Do not use emojis.
NO PURPLE: If you feel like adding purple, add Deep Indigo (#0F172A) instead. Keep the 'Neon' strictly Cyan.
TEST IDS: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
